data.reply:
Ok, we see that the transaction failed because the bank page timed out.

You should get your money back within 8-10 working days.

Alright, we see that the merchant has been credited this amount.

We will reach out to the merchant and keep you posted.

You are not eligible to get cashback for this transaction.
Here's why: Cashback was valid only till July 21, 2018.

Do you want to check our rewards section?

data.description: I want refund for this transaction
data.reply:
Money for this transaction is already credited to the merchant.

In case you have further issues, please get in touch with merchant.
They should be able to help you here
